translations.chinese: 沛公引兵繞嶢關，踰蕢山，擊秦軍，大破之藍田南。
translations.english: Pei Gong led his troops around Yao Pass, crossed Mount Qi, attacked the Qin army, and greatly defeated them south of Lantian.

translations.chinese: 遂至藍 田，又戰其北，秦兵大敗。
translations.english: He then reached Lantian and fought again to its north. The Qin troops suffered a great defeat.

translations.chinese: 或說沛公曰：「秦富十倍天下，地形彊。
translations.english: Someone advised Pei Gong: "Qin is ten times richer than the world, and its terrain is strong.

translations.chinese: 今聞章邯降項羽，羽號曰雍王，王關中。
translations.english: Now we hear that Zhang Han has surrendered to Xiang Yu, who is titled King of Yong and rules Guanzhong.

translations.chinese: 即來，沛公恐不得有 此。
translations.english: If he comes, Pei Gong fears he may not be able to hold this."
